title: Instagram's TikTok clone is going global
text: Instagram believes that it can do TikTok better than TikTok — and this August, people will be able to decide for themselves.

title: FTC considering deposing top Facebook executives in antitrust probe: WSJ
text: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is considering taking sworn testimony from Facebook Inc's top executives Mark Zuckerberg and Sheryl Sandberg as a part of its probe into whether the company has engaged in unlawful monopolistic practices, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.

title: Facebook executives could be deposed by FTC in antitrust probe, report says
text: The US Federal Trade Commission is reportedly considering taking sworn legal testimony from Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg and COO Sheryl Sandberg.

title: Facebook execs Zuckerberg, Sandberg could be deposed by FTC in antitrust probe: report
text: Facebook Inc. Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg and Chief Operating Officer Sheryl Sandberg could be deposed for sworn legal testimony by the Federal Trade Commission

title: F.T.C.’s Facebook Investigation May Stretch Past Election
text: The agency’s handling of the case stands in stark contrast to the antitrust investigation into Google by the Justice Department.

title: 1 Big Sign Facebook's TikTok Clone Is Succeeding
text: Facebook is planning a major expansion of Instagram Reels.

title: Facebook Is Doubling Down on the Virtual Reality Market
text: The tech giant is doubling down on its plans to dominate this nascent market.

title: Facebook Preparing To Launch TikTok Rival In US, 50 Other Markets
text: Facebook Inc (NASDAQ: FB) says it is getting ready for the launch of Instagram Reels, a rival to short-form video app Tiktok, in the United States and 50 other countries in August.
